title: [bug] `unlisten()` after `onCloseRequested` breaks window closing

labels.name: status: needs triage
labels.description: This issue needs to triage, applied to new issues

body:
### Describe the bug

When you `unlisten()` to remove a `onCloseRequested` handler, it breaks window closing; the callback doesn't get called as expected, but it doesn't close the window either.

### Reproduction

1. run https://github.com/vgskye/miniature-umbrella
2. click the button
3. wait five seconds
4. try to close the window

### Expected behavior

The window can be closed by window buttons after `unlisten()` is called
